extracted_information: HyperEVM facilitates interaction exclusively through JSON-RPC. There are no official frontend components; users are expected to build custom frontends or port existing EVM applications. While websocket JSON-RPC support is absent for the primary RPC endpoint (`rpc.hyperliquid.xyz/evm`), other RPC implementations might offer it. The architecture of HyperEVM is indicated as 'Dual-block architecture'. HyperEVM operates on both Mainnet and Testnet environments.
features: Compatibility with existing EVM applications (porting supported)
